@@ -186,0 +186,18 @@
+
+bool checkRange(JNIEnv *env,
+                jintArray dstPixels_arr,
+                jint dstw, jint dsth,
+                jintArray srcPixels_arr,
+                jint srcw, jint srch)
+{
+    return (srcPixels_arr == NULL ||
+            dstPixels_arr == NULL ||
+            srcw <= 0 ||
+            srch <= 0 ||
+            srcw > INT_MAX / srch ||
+            dstw <= 0 ||
+            dsth <= 0 ||
+            dstw > INT_MAX / dsth ||
+            (srcw * srch) > env->GetArrayLength(srcPixels_arr) ||
+            (dstw * dsth) > env->GetArrayLength(dstPixels_arr));
+}
